website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality engine degreaser that can also serve as a wheel cleaner. Loosens and emulsifies buildup for easier cleanup; concentrate must be watered down.
pros: use it on machinery, wheels, tools
cons: Works on metal, plastic, and rubber, but is not designed to clean grease from concrete
Be sure to rinse thoroughly after use to avoid staining

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Hey if you have $35 to waste then buy it. This is probably made for about ten cents a gallon. It does not work.. I cant get the image outta my head from the video where the lazy used car salesman is promoting this product, with that smirk on his face... After using the product I can go back to that video and read his mind... His mind reads, oh IM going to make so much money off this colored water, and all these dumb consumers are gonna think it works.... Seriously mild soapy water works way better,
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical about this product . After trying it out . I was impressed .Had a major oil leak on my Mercedes Diesel for years. Sprayed down the engine And just hosed it off . Without scrubbing 90% of the oil came off . Very impressive . Works great on the wheels to . Sprayed down the wheels and used a brush to work the stuffing in. Rinsed it off and it looks like a brand new wheel . Will attach pictures .

customer_reviews.title: Pass. Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: I would avoid this product if you're looking to degrees anything on concrete. It says to dilute the mixture and avoid certain surfaces because this is supposedly a concentrated formula. If you are able to or have access to a copper still I would suggest distilling this liquid down in concentrating yourself because it couldn't remove a drop of oil if you used the entire bottle.
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: NOT LIKE "SLAM"
customer_reviews.text: There is a product car dealers use to detail engines called "SLAM". You know the stuff that can make a 79 Pontiac engine compartment look brand new. THIS IS NOT EVEN CLOSE... I was hoping it was a new improved version because of the name, "Grand Slam". NOPE... It is a mediocre degreaser, but that is the extent of it.
customer_reviews.author: No Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Very effective degreaser
customer_reviews.text: Really good stuff , used it on my lawnmower with all the stuck on Grease and oils plus rust and grass clippings , the mower looks like new now and the degreaser makes for a quick and easy clean
customer_reviews.author: Constantinos

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely diluted this as instructed and works great. Also used it clean my hands after working on the car, and helps clean them off real well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: good item
customer_reviews.text: this stuff works prefect! I used it on my truck's motor & motor bay .. I take my truck off roading all the time, and this stuff made it look like I never drove through mud & water..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner. First time getting this product and im very happy with the results helps get grease and gunk out real good.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it’s supposed to do. My husband uses it for his car, I used it to clean my range hood vent. (Tested it first). It works great!!
customer_reviews.author: rvp12

customer_reviews.title: Immediate results!
customer_reviews.text: I used on my motorcycle and truck. It does a good job removing grease but be very careful with polished aluminum and paint it will stain. It left a white stain coat in the frame of my truck I suspect that it will work better if using a pressure washer for rinsing and some a brush or rug (to get rid of the stain). I'm satisfied the the results.
customer_reviews.author: Rami3kds

customer_reviews.title: If you're not satisfied, you won't buy any more.
customer_reviews.text: Feeling mixed with water, spraying 20 minutes of stain or not easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: zhengjinxing

customer_reviews.title: Wear a mask
customer_reviews.text: This product works amazing. I did and engine overhaul and this stuff got everything off. Engine looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: james b

customer_reviews.title: This some Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: It works! It melts the grease and grime. Follow up with engine shine and may want to take it on a date! Make sure you get a premium spray bottle and wear heavy vinyl gloves though when cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Works Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product ! Very powerful , please follow the mixing and use instructions .
customer_reviews.author: tom serena

customer_reviews.title: This is truly worth the money!! Had my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is truly worth the money!! Had my 03 Duramax blow a rod threw the block and oil painted the side of my truck! 2 weeks later I finally got around to clean it off... Could defentily tell where you sprayed this stuff because the oil didnt want to come off! Used a garden hose to rinse and the oil just ran right off with 3D!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works ! It really gets the greasy and dust out of the engine. But must wear gloves it's really around on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: M C M i

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stuff works great. Just spray and lightly scrub and it takes grease off with a rinse
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Carrasco

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: product was delivered as described and when I was told delivery eould be, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ed Cimaglio

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I was more than surprised to see Great Blast do such an outstanding job and and I am satisfied beyond expectation... No Offensive odors either, Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Its actually works
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised!! I found that if you can let it soak a while it works best.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban G.

customer_reviews.title: Cut through grease
customer_reviews.text: Cut through years of grime from under my Jeep. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Money wasted
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this product an F if it was available. About as effective as dish soap. Might clean a dirty pan not much else. Don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: BarryC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for removing stains on carpet. Like magick.
customer_reviews.author: Dutchess of Squalor

customer_reviews.title: Can be use on all kinds of product around the ...
customer_reviews.text: Can be use on all kinds of product around the house. I even use it to clean up after all kinds of messes.
customer_reviews.author: puredlight

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Very Well!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans very well, even when watered down heavily. a little bit goes a long way, and its not very Fumey!
customer_reviews.author: Meats

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing. I soaked some very grimed up parts
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I soaked some very grimed up parts. All I had to do was rinse with water, no scrubbing!
customer_reviews.author: David Ewen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product - on the engine....also great for removing dirt etc of tires....will buy again....
customer_reviews.author: pritpal panaich

customer_reviews.title: Excellant
customer_reviews.text: No kidding, it made my 1990 Mazda Miata engine compartment look brand new. Simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: john layne

customer_reviews.title: I have used this on all of my car engines ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on all of my car engines. Not only does it clean well, but this is going to last me years.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Collins

customer_reviews.title: Clean behind your engines ears...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I tried this for the first time, and honestly, from the time I opened the bottle from the time I finished, it reminded me strikingly of a very common industrial cleaner you can get at Lowes or Home Depot. the industrial purple cleaner from Zep is pretty much the same thing. This 3D works well, otherwise, so no complaints here. Be sure to dilute it (I dilute it 2:1), as full strength can discolor items. After cleaning an engine, I make sure to spot dress all cables, lines, rubber components, etc., with Klasse 2nd Formulation or oil.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Does an outstanding job when used properly
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is excellent! It was delivered promptly and did exactly as advertised and done as it is in the product video. I used it on a 78 kz650 Motor that's been sitting in a shed for decades. First used a steep brush to shrub as much dirt off as I could then I took a board brush and sprayed directly on brush and started scrubbing away. Left for a few minutes and then sprayed clean with water bottle and scrubbed a little more then rinsed and dried.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: versatile product
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile product much like Meguiar's super degreaser It can be used to clean engine bays, tires, wheel wells, to get bugs off at the right dilution (10:1), clean carpet mats and many more uses. I will definitely buy again and recommend this product to anyone looking for a versatile degreaser/ heavy duty cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: M Cnut

product_meta.title: 3D Grand Blast Engine Degreaser - 1 Gallon | Heavy Duty Industrial Cleaner & Degreaser | Removes Grease & Oil | Non Toxic & Biodegradable | Made in USA | All Natural | No Harmful Chemicals
feature_bullets: Fast acting to losen grime and grease
Works on engines, machinery, tools and floors
Easy rinse and safe on painted surfaces
